Here is the elevator pitch for PREVENT-IA:

"Meet PREVENT-IA, the AI-powered education platform designed for workers and managers in high-risk industries. This innovative solution solves the problem of inadequate occupational risk prevention training, which can lead to workplace accidents. With PREVENT-IA, workers can access on-site training, track their progress, and receive personalized training recommendations. Unlike traditional training methods, PREVENT-IA uses AI-driven insights to evaluate learning outcomes and provide real-time feedback. Our platform is specifically designed for workers in industries such as logistics, transportation, and construction, where accidents can have severe consequences. By using PREVENT-IA, workers and managers can reduce the risk of accidents, improve training outcomes, and ensure a safer work environment. With its user-friendly interface, AI-driven insights, and real-time feedback, PREVENT-IA is the best solution for workers and managers looking to prioritize occupational risk prevention."
